title: George Soros was not a Nazi SS officer
subtitle: George Soros was not a Nazi in the Second World War, and a picture claiming to show him as one is actually of the Auschwitz officer Oskar Gröning.
author: fullfact.org
vclaim:
A post claiming to show a picture of financier George Soros as a Nazi has been shared hundreds of times on Facebook.

The picture is not of Mr Soros—who is Jewish, and was a teenager in Hungary when it came under Nazi occupation—but rather of Oskar Gröning, an SS guard known as the “bookkeeper of Auschwitz”.

The misidentification has been made several times before, and it’s previously been debunked by various American news organisations.
